name: Bounty
desc: Dazzle an enemy grants +1 Coin

name: Known Evil Pays
desc: When you ring the bell, each revealed enemy grants +1 Gift

name: Holy Disclosure
desc: Ringing the bell reveals all enemies adjacent to the Church

name: Pattern Recognition
desc: Revealing 4 safe tiles in a row grants +1 Gift

name: Familiar Streets
desc: At the start of each level, reveal a random Hint tile

name: Greed Is Good
desc: Revealing the last safe tile grants +2 Coin

name: Last Chance
desc: While at 1 HP, all Gifts gained are doubled

name: Steady Hand
desc: Lighting a safe tile also reveals one adjacent safe tile

name: Peaceful Night
desc: Revealing all tiles heals 1 HP.

name: Late Mending
desc: Revealing an enemy without Light also reveals an adjacent safe tile.

name: Last Light
desc: Carry 1 Light to the next level if you have any

name: Ascetic Vow
desc: 血量上限-2，商店回复量+1

name: Blood Money
desc: Excess healing converts to Gold

name: Cash Out
desc: 碰到铃铛就变成金币吧

name: Jingle Guide
desc: Sell: Reveal the Bell

name: Amulet
desc: 当翻开一张敌人可导致游戏结束的时候，移除这个升级项并恢复一点血

name: Miser's Gift
desc: if you leave shop without buying anything, coin + 3

name: Cashback
desc: 卖掉其他升级项的时候获得金币，使用道具时获得金币？

name: Regular Face
desc: 拥有这个升级项时，商店所有物品价格减1

name: Loan Shark
desc: 购买时立刻获得10金币，卖出时需要付出15金币

name: Blood Money
desc: 致命伤：若有10金币，耗钱免伤。便宜一点

name: Medical Bill
desc: 购买时：耗尽金币，回复 全部血量。

name: PaidDonation
desc: 购买时：消耗 1 血，获得 4 金币。
每次血量减少，获得1金币
每次揭露一整行，获得1礼物
如果敌人相邻的格子都被揭示了，揭示并眩晕敌人

name: keepLight
desc: Light will keep on the tile to next level, grinch would not be generated on it.

name: steetSense
desc: when start a level, will notify if there is grinch in revealable tiles.

name: First Luck
desc: If the first card revealed is an enemy, gain 2 gift and heal 1 hp

name: Band-Aid
desc: Sell: Heal 1 HP

name: Greed Jackpot
desc: 金币翻倍

name: Owl's Secret
desc: when you sell this upgrade, reveal all hint

name: The Spotter
desc: Sell: Reveal and dazzle a random enemy
碰到敌人时，若持有礼物，则消耗 1 金币代替礼物被偷走
敌人伤害+1，金币和礼物收益+1
不满血进入商店时，随机一个商品价格为0
若不触发任何敌人就离开本层，获得 2 金币
每关一次，不使用灯光揭示敌人时：如果同一行有教堂，则眩晕敌人
购买时，移除所有升级项，返还所有金币
离开商店时若剩余金币 > 10，获得金币
商店物价全部变为 1 金币，但每次购买都会扣 1 血
卖出时：如果玩家处于 1 血状态，全屏敌人眩晕
卖出价格随关卡数增加（每过一层，卖出价格 +2）
卖掉此项时：随机获得商店中另一件随机升级项（无论价格）
金币为0时，伤害-1
